segments.text: I have a friend . He is my best friend and he wants to learn English . He would pay about 100 yuan per hour . Are you interested ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I take it you are not interested .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , Lucy . Don't get me wrong . I mean school will be open on Sept . 2nd , and I will have a very tight schedule by then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . My friend says he can always arrange his schedule around your schedule .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be fine . When can I see him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's do it this way . I'll take him to your place this Saturday . Then you two can make a schedule .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Make sure you come here before noon . I will be picking up my friend at the airport in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How are you going to get there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sure my friend can give you a ride .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . By the way , what does your friend do ?
segments.speaker: S1
